Body.Content:
Updated April 30, 2025: We have updated the timeline below. Thank you for your patience.

Due to ongoing work on Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps aimed at improving security and performance, you are required to update network information in your system's firewall and additional third-party services by the dates noted below.

When this will happen:

Please follow these instructions by June 1, 2025 (previously May 1st) to ensure uninterrupted access to our services.

How this affects your organization:

You are receiving this message because our reporting indicates your organization may be using Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps. Administrators may no longer be able to be able to see the Organization logo on M365 portal in the overview page. when this change is implemented.

What you need to do to prepare:

Please update your firewall rules to allow below endpoints by June 1, 2025 (previously May 1st).

  1. discoveryresources-cdn-prod.cloudappsecurity.com
  2. discoveryresources-cdn-gov.cloudappsecurity.us 

All required outbound access URLs can also be found in Network requirements under "Portal Access"

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Due to updates in Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps, you must update your firewall and third-party services by June 1, 2025. This change may affect the visibility of your organizationâ€™s logo on the M365 portal. Update firewall rules to allow specified endpoints. More details are available in the provided link.

Title: Action Required - Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps Network Configurations Changes
